SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order (code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, type, status, orderPrice, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update order set code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawId = #{drawid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawExtId = #{drawextid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderPrice = #{orderprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opName = #{opname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opid = #{opid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, type, status, orderPrice, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
